roleset.name: to make out of components
roleset.note: FASHION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fashion' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from fashion.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Now [*-2] shifting his scene from the country [0]he left [*T*-1] at five to the England [0] he has lived in [*T*-3] for nearly 30 years , he has fashioned a novel in the mode of Henry James and E.M. Forster .
example.arg: a novel in the mode of Henry James and E.M. Forster

roleset.name: stylish
roleset.note: FASHIONABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from fashionable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: for example , his dress and makeup were very fashionable and he had a first love .
